post_title: WTT/WTB: Lenox, UZIT, CB, Red Hindu or Drum
post_content: Would love to trade or buy toward commons or HOFers. Looking for low grade with good eye appeal. UZIT and Drum are my first priority here. Thanks!
Still looking - a Uzit or Lenox would be fun!
I have an authentic jennings one hand brown lenox if your interested
